attributes.action: Reduce or remove VAT on the supply, rental & repair of bicycles, inc. e-bikes
attributes.additional_details:
Follow suit with the EU and reduce (or even remove) VAT on the supply, rental and repair of bicycles, including e-bikes. This could encourage more people to cycle and thus reduce carbon emissions, and improve life in our country and on our planet. 

More movement, less pollution, better health for all.

More info at https://www.ecf.com/news-and-events/news/cycling-organisations-achieve-important-victory-eu-consumers-reduced-vat-soon
attributes.background: Follow suit with the EU and reduce (or even remove) VAT on the supply, rental and repair of bicycles, including e-bikes. This could encourage more people to cycle and thus reduce carbon emissions, which in turn would improve life in our country and on our planet.
